snippet.title: Sin and Punishment - N64 Gameplay
snippet.description: Sin and Punishment. Previously unreleased in the US, until the advent of the Wii Virtual Console. Captured from an NTSC Wii Virtual Console. For more information on this title, please visit: http://n64guide.com/games/sinandpunishment
